fixes.name: Calculation3
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau string concatenation and STR() to DAX: replaced [TermReason] with 'HR Dataset'[TermReason], STR([Termd]) with FORMAT('HR Dataset'[Termd], "0") to cast integer to text, and replaced + with & for string concatenation. This is a row-level transformation, so implemented as a calculated column.
